quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.

quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.

quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore
quotes.quote: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.

quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda
quotes.quote: Arise, awake, and stop not until the goal is reached.

quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda
quotes.quote: In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart.

quotes.author: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar
quotes.quote: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.

quotes.author: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar
quotes.quote: I measure the progress of a community by the degree of progress which women have achieved.

quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla
quotes.quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. It just has to be driven.

quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla
quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.author: Indira Gandhi
quotes.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.

quotes.author: Indira Gandhi
quotes.quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.

quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
